title: Bug 6656 - Close button moves down when view resized smaller
OB: When the view, such as the Navigator, is resized smaller, the close button and another tool item move below the label.
EB: The close button and the other tool item should stay on the same line as the label, regardless of how small the view is resized. They should be located to the far right corner, as users are accustomed to.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the application on Linux.
2. Go to a view like the Navigator.
3. Resize the view smaller.
   *** The close button and the other tool item should move below the label. ***
